Name: Aleesha's Tower
About the game: A young woman named Aleesha was hunted and killed accused of witchcraft. Years later she comes back to take revenge on all mankind and it's up to you to stop her. Aleesha's Tower is an action platformer game inspired by the arcade classics of the 80's and 90's. In it you are a warrior and must prevent the evil horde created by Aleesha to destroy all mankind. In Aleesha's Tower you will have to go through 6 different scenarios each one with their bosses. For this, besides your sword and shield, you will find some sub weapons along the way. In Aleesha's Tower you will find: - Handmade pixel art. - 6 different bosses. - Lots of nostalgia for those who lived the arcade era. - Many different enemies. - And much more ...
